entry.title: New release for Yattee: v1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added support for "Podcasts" and "Releases" channel tabs (Invidious)
  • Added button in Location settings to add current used public location to "Custom Locations"
  • Search text field focuses automatically on macOS
  • Added Info section in Player settings Added option to hide chapters Added option to hide related videos Moved other previous Info section settings
  • Increased controls timeline/scrubber gesture area for easier handling
  • Fixed handling playlist links
  • Fixed issue where Piped videos would use audio for other language version
  • Fixed issue with handling opening URLs on macOS
  • Fixed issue with "Keep channels with unwatched videos on top of subscriptions list" setting not honored in sidebar
  • Fixed performance issues with accounts with large amount of subscribed channels
  • Fixed regression with opening videos links
  • Fixed issue with deselecting formats in Quality profiles
  • Fixed issue with formatting video dates (Piped)
  • Fixed issue where screensaver would turn on while playing video with AVPlayer on tvOS
  • Fixed compatibility with iOS 17, macOS 14 and tvOS 17
  • Updated mpv and dependencies (using mpvkit library, mpv 0.36.0, ffmpeg 6.0)
  • Fixed reported crashes
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

New Contributors

  • @PabloMz85 made their first contribution in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/494
  • @amaumene made their first contribution in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/507
  • @dnicolson made their first contribution in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/531

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yattee/yattee/compare/v1.4.5...v1.5

entry.title: New release for Yattee: v1.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • support for private instances by @stonerl in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/565
  • honour the aspect ratio when resizing by @stonerl in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/562
  • make links in description clickable by @stonerl in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/560
  • make description collapsible by @stonerl in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/559
  • macOS: disable hit testing when not expanded by @stonerl in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/578
  • disable portraitUpsideDown on iPhones by @stonerl in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/569
  • make chapters collapsible and highlight current chapter by @stonerl in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/564
  • more robust regex for chapters from description by @stonerl in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/597
  • Translations update from Weblate
  • Added Persian, Spanish, Turkish and Russian localizations
  • Other changes and improvements

New Contributors

  • @stonerl made their first contribution in https://github.com/yattee/yattee/pull/565

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yattee/yattee/compare/v1.5...v1.5.1
